[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    private List<Object> [0m[1;35mparse[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbyte[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[39m bytes, List<byte[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[39m> subrs, List<Object> [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msequence, int depth[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m             throws IOException[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdepth > MAX_RECURSION_DEPTH[0m[1;39m)[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            throw new [0m[1;35mIOException[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"Maximum recursion depth exceeded in charstring [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [32mparsing for glyph '"[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+                    + currentGlyph + [0m[32m"' of font "[0m[39m + fontName[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         DataInput input = new [0m[1;35mDataInputByteArray[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         while [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35minput.hasRemaining[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m             int b0 = [0m[1;35minput.readUnsignedByte[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m             if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mb0 == CALLSUBR[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m             [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-                [0m[1;35mprocessCallSubr[0m[1;39m([0m[39msubrs, sequence[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+                [0m[1;35mprocessCallSubr[0m[1;39m([0m[39msubrs, sequence, depth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m             [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m             else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mb0 == TWO_BYTE && [0m[1;35minput.peekUnsignedByte[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m == CALLOTHERSUBR[0m[1;39m)[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m             [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===[0m[33mIssue[0m[39m===[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mERROR: libFuzzer: timeout[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fuzzing process using libFuzzer has encountered a timeout error, indicating [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat the execution of certain test inputs is taking longer than the configured [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtimeout threshold. This suggests the presence of a performance issue or potential [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minfinite loop/hang condition in the code under test.[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Issue Overview[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe error message [0m[32m"libFuzzer: timeout"[0m[39m indicates that during fuzzing operations, at[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mleast one test case exceeded the maximum allowed execution time. LibFuzzer [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mautomatically terminates execution when a single test input runs for longer than [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe configured timeout period [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtypically a few seconds to prevent hangs[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Nature of the Problem[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA timeout during fuzzing typically occurs due to one or more of the following [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mscenarios in the code under test:[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Execution paths that involve excessive computation or resource consumption[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Algorithmic complexity issues where processing time grows disproportionately with[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minput size[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Loops or recursive functions that iterate/recurse an excessive number of times [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbased on fuzzer-generated input[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Blocking operations or synchronous waits that don't complete within the timeout [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwindow[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Deadlocks or race conditions in concurrent code[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Important Observations[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The timeout is occurring during automated fuzzing, meaning specific input [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpatterns are triggering slow execution paths[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The issue is reproducible through the fuzzing harness with certain input payloads[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- This represents a denial-of-service [0m[1;39m([0m[39mDoS[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m vulnerability class, as maliciously [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcrafted inputs could cause the application to hang or consume excessive resources [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min production environments[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The timeout mechanism in libFuzzer has successfully detected this issue, [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpreventing the fuzzer from getting permanently stuck[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Investigation Areas[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mTo understand the complete scope of this issue, the following areas of the codebase[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mshould be investigated:[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Fuzzing Harness Entry Points**: Examine which functions are being tested [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthrough the fuzzing harness to identify the attack surface and entry points where [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minput is processed[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Input Processing Logic**: Analyze how the fuzzer-generated input data is [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mparsed, validated, and processed through the application logic[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Loops and Iterations**: Review all loop constructs [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfor, while, do-while[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m that[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprocess input-dependent data to identify potential unbounded iterations[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Recursive Functions**: Examine recursive function calls that might have [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minsufficient termination conditions or depth limits[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Algorithmic Complexity**: Evaluate algorithms used for data processing, [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msearching, sorting, or pattern matching that might exhibit worst-case time [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcomplexity with certain input patterns[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. **Resource Allocation**: Review memory allocation patterns and data structure [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moperations that might scale poorly with input size[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m7[0m[39m. **External Dependencies**: Check if the code interacts with external resources [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mfile I/O, network operations, database queries[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m that could cause delays[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m8[0m[39m. **Concurrency Constructs**: If applicable, examine locks, mutexes, condition [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvariables, and thread synchronization mechanisms for potential deadlock scenarios[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe investigation should focus on identifying which specific code paths are [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexecuted during the timeout condition and understanding what input characteristics [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtrigger the problematic behavior.[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m550[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m551[0m[39m:            decrypted = [0m[1;35mdecrypt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mhexToBinary[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, EEXEC_KEY, [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m552[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m553[0m[39m:        lexer = new [0m[1;35mType1Lexer[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdecrypted[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m554[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m555[0m[39m:        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m find [0m[35m/[0m[95mPrivate[0m[39m dict[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m556[0m[39m:        Token peekToken = [0m[1;35mlexer.peekToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m557[0m[39m:        while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpeekToken != null && ![0m[32m"Private"[0m[1;35m.equals[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mpeekToken.getText[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m558[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m559[0m[39m:            [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m for a more thorough validation, the presence of [0m[32m"begin"[0m[39m before [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPrivate[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m560[0m[39m:            [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m determines how code before and following charstrings should look[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m561[0m[39m:            [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m it is not currently checked anyway[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m562[0m[39m:            [0m[1;35mlexer.nextToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m563[0m[39m:            peekToken = [0m[1;35mlexer.peekToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m564[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m565[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpeekToken == null[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m566[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m567[0m[39m:            throw new [0m[1;35mIOException[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"/Private token not found"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m568[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m569[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m570[0m[39m:        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Private dict[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m571[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mread[0m[1;39m([0m[39mToken.LITERAL, [0m[32m"Private"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m572[0m[39m:        int length = [0m[1;35mread[0m[1;39m([0m[39mToken.INTEGER[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35m.intValue[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m575[0m[39m:        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m instead of the [0m[32m"dup"[0m                                                 [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m580[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m584[0m[39m:            if [0m[1;39m([0m[39m![0m[1;35mlexer.peekKind[0m[1;39m([0m[39mToken.LITERAL[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                                 [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Analysis of Code Snippets and Evaluation Report[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mBased on the comprehensive analysis of the code snippets, I have identified [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmultiple root causes for the libFuzzer timeout error:[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Root Causes Identified:[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Infinite Loops in Type1Parser** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mvuln_3, vuln_4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Lines [0m[1;36m217[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m223[0m[39m: Loop searching for [0m[32m"dup"[0m[35m/[0m[32m"readonly"[0m[35m/[0m[32m"def"[0m[39m tokens[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Lines [0m[1;36m640[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m644[0m[39m: Loop searching for [0m[32m"CharStrings"[0m[39m token[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Both loops call `[0m[1;35mlexer.peekToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35m.getText[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` without null checks, causing [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39meither NullPointerException or infinite loops when EOF is reached[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Insufficient Cycle Detection in XrefParser** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mvuln_8[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Lines [0m[1;36m105[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m177[0m[39m: Loop following PREV references in XRef chains[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Only checks immediate predecessor [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`lastPrev`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, missing longer cycles [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mA→B→C→A[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Missing Cycle Detection in PDPageTree** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mvuln_7[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Lines [0m[1;36m184[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m197[0m[39m: PageIterator constructor traversing page tree[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No tracking of visited nodes, allowing circular references to cause infinite [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mloops[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Unbounded Recursion in Type1CharStringParser**:[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Lines [0m[1;36m109[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m143[0m[39m: Recursive CALLSUBR processing[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No depth limit or cycle detection for subroutine calls[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Memory Allocation Issues** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mvuln_5, vuln_6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Type1Lexer line [0m[1;36m507[0m[39m: Unchecked byte array allocation[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - PfbParser lines [0m[1;36m156[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m166[0m[39m: Integer overflow in size calculation[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Both can cause timeouts due to excessive memory allocation and GC pressure[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Critical Logic to Preserve:[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The parsing logic for Type1 fonts and PDF structures must remain functional[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Existing null checks and validation in correctly implemented methods [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mreadProc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, `[0m[1;35mreadProcVoid[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, `[0m[1;35mreadValue[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The cycle detection pattern in [0m[1;35mPDPageTree.get[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m method [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m304[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m314[0m[1;39m)[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The proper null-checking pattern in parseBinary lines [0m[1;36m556[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m563[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Comprehensive Fix Strategy[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Fix [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m: Type1Parser Infinite Loop Vulnerabilities [0m[1;39m([0m[39mvuln_3 & vuln_4[0m[1;39m)[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**File**: `fontbox/src/main/java/org/apache/fontbox/type1/Type1Parser.java`[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Location [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m** - Lines [0m[1;36m217[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m223[0m[39m in `[0m[1;35mreadEncoding[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` method:[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```java[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhile [0m[1;39m([0m[39m![0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mlexer.peekKind[0m[1;39m([0m[39mToken.NAME[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        && [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mlexer.peekToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35m.getText[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35m.equals[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"dup"[0m[1;39m)[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m                || [0m[1;35mlexer.peekToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35m.getText[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35m.equals[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"readonly"[0m[1;39m)[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m                || [0m[1;35mlexer.peekToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35m.getText[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35m.equals[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"def"[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m{[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;35mlexer.nextToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Fix Strategy**:[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mReplace this loop with a pattern that checks for null tokens before dereferencing:[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Change the loop to explicitly check if `[0m[1;35mnextToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` returns null[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Throw an IOException if EOF is reached without finding expected tokens[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Follow the safe pattern demonstrated in lines [0m[1;36m556[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m563[0m[39m of the same file[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Location [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m** - Lines [0m[1;36m640[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m644[0m[39m in `[0m[1;35mparseBinary[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` method:[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```java[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhile [0m[1;39m([0m[39m![0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mlexer.peekKind[0m[1;39m([0m[39mToken.LITERAL[0m[1;39m)[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        && [0m[1;35mlexer.peekToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35m.getText[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35m.equals[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"CharStrings"[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m{[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;35mlexer.nextToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Fix Strategy**:[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mApply the same null-checking pattern as Location [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m:[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Check if `[0m[1;35mnextToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` returns null before continuing[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Throw IOException with appropriate error message if expected token not found[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Implementation Steps**:[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. For both locations, consume tokens with `[0m[1;35mnextToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and store the result[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Check if the returned token is null, and if so, throw IOException[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Check the token kind and text value only after confirming it's not null[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. This mirrors the safe pattern already present in lines [0m[1;36m556[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m563[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Fix [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m: XrefParser Cycle Detection Enhancement [0m[1;39m([0m[39mvuln_8[0m[1;39m)[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**File**: `pdfbox/src/main/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdfparser/XrefParser.java`[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Location** - Lines [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m177[0m[39m in `[0m[1;35mparseXref[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` method:[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Current Issue**:[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Only tracks `lastPrev` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mimmediate predecessor[0m[1;39m)[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Misses cycles like A→B→C→A[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Fix Strategy**:[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mReplace the single `lastPrev` variable with a `Set<Long>` to track all visited [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moffsets:[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Import `java.util.HashSet` at the top of the file[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Replace `long lastPrev = [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m;` with `Set<Long> prevSet = new HashSet<>[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Before processing each `prev` value, check if it's already in the set[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. If found in set, throw IOException about cycle detection[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Otherwise, add it to the set and continue processing[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Remove the `lastPrev` comparisons at lines [0m[1;36m105[0m[39m and [0m[1;36m173[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Implementation Steps**:[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Line [0m[1;36m102[0m[39m: Replace with `Set<Long> prevSet = new HashSet<>[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Line [0m[1;36m105[0m[39m: Change loop condition to `while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mprev > [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- After line [0m[1;36m107[0m[39m: Add `if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mprevSet.contains[0m[1;39m([0m[39mprev[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m[39m throw new [0m[1;35mIOException[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"/Prev [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [32mloop detected at offset "[0m[39m + prev[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m; [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m`[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- After the check: Add `[0m[1;35mprevSet.add[0m[1;39m([0m[39mprev[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Remove the comparison at line [0m[1;36m173[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Fix [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m: PDPageTree Cycle Detection [0m[1;39m([0m[39mvuln_7[0m[1;39m)[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**File**: `pdfbox/src/main/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdmodel/PDPageTree.java`[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Location** - Lines [0m[1;36m184[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m197[0m[39m in `PageIterator` constructor:[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Current Issue**:[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- No tracking of visited nodes during tree traversal[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Circular references cause infinite loops[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Fix Strategy**:[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAdd a visited set to track processed nodes during iteration:[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Add a `Set<COSDictionary>` field to the PageIterator class[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. In the constructor, check each node before processing[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. If node is already visited, skip it and log a warning[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Otherwise, add it to the visited set and continue[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Implementation Steps**:[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Add field: `private final Set<COSDictionary> visited = new HashSet<>[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In the constructor loop [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m187[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, before calling `[0m[1;35menqueueKids[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`:[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Check if node is in `visited` set[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - If yes, log warning and skip[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - If no, add to `visited` set and process[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In `[0m[1;35menqueueKids[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` method [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m206[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, also check visited set before processing[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Fix [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m: Type1CharStringParser Recursion Limits[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**File**: `fontbox/src/main/java/org/apache/fontbox/cff/Type1CharStringParser.java`[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Location** - Lines [0m[1;36m78[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m143[0m[39m in `[0m[1;35mparse[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and `[0m[1;35mprocessCallSubr[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` methods:[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Current Issue**:[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Recursive parsing without depth limits[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- No cycle detection for CALLSUBR chains[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Fix Strategy**:[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAdd recursion depth tracking and limits:[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Add a depth parameter to the private `[0m[1;35mparse[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` method[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Add a maximum depth constant [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m)[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Check depth before recursive calls and throw exception if exceeded[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Track visited subroutine indices to detect direct cycles[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Implementation Steps**:[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Add constant: `private static final int MAX_RECURSION_DEPTH = [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m;`[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Modify method signature: `private List<Object> [0m[1;35mparse[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbyte[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[39m bytes, List<byte[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[39m> [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubrs, List<Object> sequence, int depth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- At start of method: `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdepth > MAX_RECURSION_DEPTH[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m[39m throw new [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mIOException[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"Maximum recursion depth exceeded"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m; [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m`[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- At line [0m[1;36m125[0m[39m: Change to `[0m[1;35mparse[0m[1;39m([0m[39msubrBytes, subrs, sequence, depth + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Update public method at line [0m[1;36m75[0m[39m to pass initial depth: `return [0m[1;35mparse[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbytes, [0m      [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Fix [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m: Type1Lexer Memory Allocation Validation [0m[1;39m([0m[39mvuln_5[0m[1;39m)[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**File**: `fontbox/src/main/java/org/apache/fontbox/type1/Type1Lexer.java`[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Location** - Lines [0m[1;36m502[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m515[0m[39m in `[0m[1;35mreadCharString[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` method:[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Current Issue**:[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Unchecked allocation of byte array based on user input[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Fix Strategy**:[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAdd validation before allocation:[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Define a maximum reasonable charstring size [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., [0m[1;36m65535[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Check the length parameter before allocating[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Throw appropriate exception if length exceeds maximum[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Implementation Steps**:[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Add constant at class level: `private static final int MAX_CHARSTRING_LENGTH = [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m65535[0m[39m;`[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- After line [0m[1;36m505[0m[39m, before line [0m[1;36m507[0m[39m: Add validation check[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```java[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m || length > MAX_CHARSTRING_LENGTH[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      throw new [0m[1;35mIOException[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"Invalid charstring length: "[0m[39m + length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Fix [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m: PfbParser Integer Overflow Protection [0m[1;39m([0m[39mvuln_6[0m[1;39m)[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**File**: `fontbox/src/main/java/org/apache/fontbox/pfb/PfbParser.java`[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Location** - Lines [0m[1;36m156[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m166[0m[39m in `[0m[1;35mparsePfb[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` method:[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Current Issue**:[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Integer overflow when reading [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m-byte size value[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Negative sizes bypass validation checks[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Fix Strategy**:[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mCast to long before arithmetic to prevent overflow:[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Change the size calculation to use long casting[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Add explicit check for negative size values[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Validate size before using it for array allocation[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Implementation Steps**:[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Keep `size` as int for array allocation compatibility[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- At line [0m[1;36m161[0m[39m, change to: `long newTotal = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlong[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mtotal + [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlong[0m[1;39m)[0m[39msize;`[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- After line [0m[1;36m159[0m[39m, before line [0m[1;36m160[0m[39m, add: [0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```java[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize < [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      throw new [0m[1;35mIOException[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"Invalid negative size: "[0m[39m + size[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The existing check at line [0m[1;36m162[0m[39m will now correctly catch overflow cases[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Justification and Explanation[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Why This Approach is Optimal:[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Addresses All Root Causes**: Each identified vulnerability is directly fixed [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwith targeted solutions[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Follows Existing Patterns**: Uses patterns already present in the codebase [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39me.g., the safe loop pattern in Type1Parser lines [0m[1;36m556[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m563[0m[39m, cycle detection in [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mPDPageTree.get[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Minimal Changes**: Only modifies the problematic code sections, preserving all[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mother functionality[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Defensive Programming**: Adds proper validation and bounds checking without [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mremoving functionality[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **No Harness Modification**: All fixes are in the core library code, not the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzzing harness[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### How It Preserves Existing Logic:[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Type1Parser**: Still searches for the same tokens, just with proper EOF [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhandling[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **XrefParser**: Still follows PREV chains, but now detects any cycle length[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **PDPageTree**: Still iterates all pages, but prevents infinite loops on circular[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreferences[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Type1CharStringParser**: Still processes subroutines recursively, but with [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreasonable depth limits[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Memory Allocations**: Still allocate necessary memory, but with validation to [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprevent abuse[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### How It Addresses the Timeout Issue:[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Infinite Loops**: All unbounded loops now have termination conditions [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnull [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchecks, visited sets[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Excessive Recursion**: Depth limits prevent stack exhaustion and timeout[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Memory Issues**: Size validation prevents allocation-related timeouts from GC [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpressure[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Cycle Detection**: Comprehensive cycle detection prevents traversal of [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcircular structures[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Potential Side Effects and Mitigation:[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Rejection of Edge-Case Valid Files**: [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Mitigation: Chosen limits [0m[1;39m([0m[39mrecursion [0m[33mdepth[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, [0m[33mcharstring[0m[39m=[0m[35m65KB[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m are generous [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand should accommodate legitimate files[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Log warnings when approaching limits to aid debugging[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Performance Overhead**:[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Mitigation: HashSet operations are [0m[1;35mO[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m average case, minimal overhead[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Only used during parsing, not runtime rendering[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Error Messages**:[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Mitigation: Clear, descriptive IOExceptions help identify malformed files[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Include context [0m[1;39m([0m[39moffset, size, depth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m in error messages[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Similar Solutions in Codebase:[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **[0m[1;35mPDPageTree.get[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m304[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m314[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: Already uses pageSet for cycle detection - [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwe're extending this pattern to PageIterator[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Type1Parser [0m[1;35mparseBinary[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m556[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m563[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: Already uses proper null checking [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- we're applying this pattern to the vulnerable loops[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **[0m[1;35mreadProc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and [0m[1;35mreadProcVoid[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m**: Already throw IOException on null tokens - [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwe're making the vulnerable loops consistent with this approach[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis strategy provides a comprehensive, minimal-impact solution that prevents all [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39midentified timeout scenarios while maintaining backward compatibility with [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlegitimate files.[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
