[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m[[0m[39mERROR[0m[1;39m][0m[39m [0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m[[0m[39mERROR[0m[1;39m][0m[39m For more information about the errors[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===[0m[33mIssue[0m[39m===[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mERROR: libFuzzer: timeout[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue reports a [0m[32m"libFuzzer: timeout"[0m[39m error, indicating that the fuzzing[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprocess encountered an operation that exceeded the time limit. The patch attempt [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maddresses this by adding timeout prevention measures in multiple files: [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mType1Parser.java, XrefParser.java, PDPageTree.java, and Type1CharStringParser.java.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch introduces null checks, cycle detection, and recursion depth limits. [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHowever, the patch compilation failed with three errors related to method signature[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmismatches, type incompatibilities, and variable redefinition.[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Initial Issue[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe issue presents a timeout error during libFuzzer execution. This type of error [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtypically occurs when the code enters an infinite loop, experiences excessive [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrecursion, or processes data structures with circular references without proper [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdetection mechanisms. The timeout indicates that the fuzzer discovered an input [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat causes the program to hang or execute for an abnormally long time.[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Patch Attempt Analysis[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch modifies four files across the fontbox and pdfbox modules:[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. Type1Parser.java [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfontbox module[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:**[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Two while loops are modified to include null checks and break conditions[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- At line [0m[1;36m214[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m232[0m[39m: The loop searching for [0m[32m"dup"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"readonly"[0m[39m, or [0m[32m"def"[0m[39m tokens now [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchecks if `[0m[1;35mpeekToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` returns null before proceeding, throwing an IOException [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwith message [0m[32m"Unexpected end of file while reading encoding"[0m[39m if null is encountered[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- At line [0m[1;36m646[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m662[0m[39m: The loop searching for [0m[32m"CharStrings"[0m[39m literal token similarly [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39madds null checking and throws [0m[32m"/CharStrings token not found"[0m[39m if the token is null[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Both loops are restructured from while conditions to infinite loops with explicit[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbreak statements[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**[0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. XrefParser.java [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpdfbox module[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:**[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The PREV chain parsing logic is modified to detect cycles[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Replaces the simple `lastPrev` variable with a `HashSet<Long>` called `prevSet`[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Before processing each offset in the PREV chain, checks if the offset has been [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mseen before[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- If a cycle is detected, throws IOException with message [0m[32m"/Prev loop detected at [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [32moffset [0m[32m[[0m[32moffset[0m[32m][0m[32m"[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Removes the post-loop check that compared `prev == lastPrev`[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**[0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. PDPageTree.java [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpdfbox module[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:**[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Adds a `visited` HashSet to the PageIterator inner class to track visited nodes[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Modifies the `enqueueKids` method to check if a node has been visited before [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprocessing[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Adds a warning log message when circular references are detected: [0m[32m"Circular [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [32mreference detected in page tree, skipping node"[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Restructures the enqueueKids method to check visited status before any processing[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**[0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. Type1CharStringParser.java [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfontbox module[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:**[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Introduces a constant `MAX_RECURSION_DEPTH = [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m` to limit recursion[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Adds a `depth` parameter to the `parse` method[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Checks if depth exceeds MAX_RECURSION_DEPTH and throws IOException with message [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mindicating maximum recursion depth exceeded[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Passes the depth parameter when calling `processCallSubr`[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Compilation Errors[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch results in three compilation errors:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Error [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mType1CharStringParser.jav[0m[1;92ma:95[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:**[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The `processCallSubr` method is called with three arguments [0m[1;39m([0m[39msubrs, sequence, [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdepth[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- However, the method signature only accepts two parameters: List<byte[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[39m> and [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mList<Object>[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The patch adds a depth parameter to the call but doesn't modify the method [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msignature[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Error [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mType1CharStringParser.jav[0m[1;92ma:133[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:**[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- An incompatible type error where a List<Object> cannot be converted to String[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- This suggests there's a type mismatch in the code at line [0m[1;36m133[0m[39m that may have been [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mintroduced or exposed by the patch[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Error [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mType1Parser.jav[0m[1;92ma:651[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:**[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Variable `peekToken` is already defined in the `[0m[1;35mparseBinary[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbyte[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` method[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The patch introduces a `peekToken` variable at line [0m[1;36m651[0m[39m, but this variable name [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mis already in use earlier in the same method scope[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- This is a direct consequence of applying similar patterns to two different [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlocations within the same method[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Areas Requiring Investigation[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mTo fully understand and resolve the timeout issue, the following areas should be [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minvestigated:[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Type1CharStringParser.java**: The complete signature and implementation of the[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`processCallSubr` method to understand how to properly propagate the depth [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mparameter through recursive calls[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Type1CharStringParser.java [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m133[0m[39m area[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m**: The context around line [0m[1;36m133[0m[39m to [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munderstand what operation is attempting to convert a List<Object> to String and [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhether this is part of the original code or introduced by the patch[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Type1Parser.java parseBinary method**: The full scope of the `parseBinary` [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmethod to identify all existing variable names and understand how to avoid naming [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mconflicts when introducing the second `peekToken` variable[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Lexer implementation**: The behavior of the `[0m[1;35mpeekToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` method and when it [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreturns null, to validate the null-checking approach is appropriate[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Original timeout scenarios**: Test cases or fuzzer inputs that trigger the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtimeout to understand which specific code paths are problematic [0m[1;39m([0m[39minfinite loops in [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mencoding parsing, CharStrings searching, PREV chain traversal, page tree traversal,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mor charstring recursion[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. **PDPageTree structure validation**: How PDF page trees are structured and what [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mconstitutes valid versus circular references in the specification[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m551[0m[39m:            decrypted = [0m[1;35mdecrypt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mhexToBinary[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, EEXEC_KEY, [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m552[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m553[0m[39m:        lexer = new [0m[1;35mType1Lexer[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdecrypted[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m554[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m555[0m[39m:        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m find [0m[35m/[0m[95mPrivate[0m[39m dict[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m556[0m[39m:        Token peekToken = [0m[1;35mlexer.peekToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m557[0m[39m:        while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpeekToken != null && ![0m[32m"Private"[0m[1;35m.equals[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mpeekToken.getText[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m558[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m559[0m[39m:            [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m for a more thorough validation, the presence of [0m[32m"begin"[0m[39m before [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPrivate[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m560[0m[39m:            [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m determines how code before and following charstrings should look[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m561[0m[39m:            [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m it is not currently checked anyway[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m562[0m[39m:            [0m[1;35mlexer.nextToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m563[0m[39m:            peekToken = [0m[1;35mlexer.peekToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m564[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m565[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpeekToken == null[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m566[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m567[0m[39m:            throw new [0m[1;35mIOException[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"/Private token not found"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m568[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m570[0m[39m:        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Private dict[0m                                                         [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m572[0m[39m:        int length = [0m[1;35mread[0m[1;39m([0m[39mToken.INTEGER[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35m.intValue[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Analysis Summary[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter analyzing the evaluation report and code snippets, I've identified the root [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcauses of all compilation errors and the original timeout issue:[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Root Causes[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Type1CharStringParser compilation errors:**[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Error [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m95[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: `processCallSubr` called with [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m arguments [0m[1;39m([0m[39mincluding depth[0m[1;39m)[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbut method signature only accepts [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m parameters[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Error [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m133[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: Likely a misplaced or incorrect patch modification near [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe LOG.warn statement[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The fix requires updating method signatures to propagate the depth parameter[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Type1Parser compilation error:**[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Error [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m651[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: Variable `peekToken` redeclared when it's already in scope[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfrom line [0m[1;36m556[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The variable persists throughout the entire `parseBinary` method scope[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Original timeout issues:**[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Type1Parser: Two infinite loops when token stream ends unexpectedly [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mreadEncoding and CharStrings search[0m[1;39m)[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Type1CharStringParser: No recursion depth limit for CALLSUBR operations[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - XrefParser: Simple lastPrev check only detects immediate cycles [0m[1;39m([0m[39mA→A[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, not [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlonger cycles [0m[1;39m([0m[39mA→B→A[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - PDPageTree: PageIterator has no cycle detection in BFS traversal[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Comprehensive Fix Strategy[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. Type1CharStringParser.java - Add Recursion Depth Tracking[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Location: [0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfontbox/src/main/java/org/apache/fontbox/cff/Type1CharStringParser.java**[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39ma[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Add constant after line [0m[1;36m48[0m[39m:[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```java[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprivate static final int MAX_RECURSION_DEPTH = [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mb[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Modify public parse method [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m72[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m76[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to pass initial depth:[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```java[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpublic List<Object> [0m[1;35mparse[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbyte[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[39m bytes, List<byte[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[39m> subrs, String glyphName[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthrows IOException[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m{[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    currentGlyph = glyphName;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    return [0m[1;35mparse[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbytes, subrs, new ArrayList<>[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Update private parse method signature [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m78[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to accept depth parameter:[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```java[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprivate List<Object> [0m[1;35mparse[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbyte[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[39m bytes, List<byte[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[39m> subrs, List<Object> sequence,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mint depth[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        throws IOException[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Add depth check at the beginning of private parse method [0m[1;39m([0m[39mafter line [0m[1;36m80[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```java[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdepth > MAX_RECURSION_DEPTH[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m{[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    throw new [0m[1;35mIOException[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"Maximum recursion depth exceeded in charstring for glyph[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [32m'"[0m[39m [0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m            + currentGlyph + [0m[32m"' of font "[0m[39m + fontName[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39me[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Update processCallSubr method signature [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m109[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to accept depth:[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```java[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprivate void [0m[1;35mprocessCallSubr[0m[1;39m([0m[39mList<byte[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[39m> subrs, List<Object> sequence, int depth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthrows IOException[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Update processCallSubr call at line [0m[1;36m87[0m[39m to pass depth:[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```java[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mprocessCallSubr[0m[1;39m([0m[39msubrs, sequence, depth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mg[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Update recursive parse call inside processCallSubr [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m125[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to increment [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdepth:[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```java[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mparse[0m[1;39m([0m[39msubrBytes, subrs, sequence, depth + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Rationale:** This prevents infinite recursion by limiting the depth of CALLSUBR [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcalls. The depth parameter is threaded through the call chain, incrementing at each[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrecursive level. MAX_RECURSION_DEPTH of [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m is sufficient for legitimate fonts while[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpreventing stack overflow.[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. Type1Parser.java - Fix Infinite Loops in Token Parsing[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Location: fontbox/src/main/java/org/apache/fontbox/type1/Type1Parser.java**[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m#### Fix [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m: readEncoding method [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m217[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m223[0m[1;39m)[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mReplace the while loop with proper null checking:[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```java[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhile [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtrue[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m{[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    Token token = [0m[1;35mlexer.peekToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtoken == null[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        throw new [0m[1;35mIOException[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"Unexpected end of file while reading encoding"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mlexer.peekKind[0m[1;39m([0m[39mToken.NAME[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m            && [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mtoken.getText[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35m.equals[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"dup"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m                    || [0m[1;35mtoken.getText[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35m.equals[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"readonly"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m                    || [0m[1;35mtoken.getText[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35m.equals[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"def"[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        break;[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;35mlexer.nextToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m#### Fix [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m: parseBinary method CharStrings search [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m640[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m644[0m[1;39m)[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mReuse the existing `peekToken` variable declared at line [0m[1;36m556[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdo NOT redeclare[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```java[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhile [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtrue[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m{[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    peekToken = [0m[1;35mlexer.peekToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpeekToken == null[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        throw new [0m[1;35mIOException[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"/CharStrings token not found"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mlexer.peekKind[0m[1;39m([0m[39mToken.LITERAL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m            && [0m[1;35mpeekToken.getText[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35m.equals[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"CharStrings"[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        break;[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;35mlexer.nextToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Rationale:** The original loops would run forever when the token stream ends [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[1;35mpeekToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m returns null[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. The negated condition `![0m[1;39m([0m[39mpeekKind && [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mgetText[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35m.equals[0m[1;39m([0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` would be true when peekToken is null, causing infinite [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mloops. By explicitly checking for null first and throwing an IOException, we [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprevent timeouts and provide clear error messages. Reusing the existing `peekToken`[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvariable avoids the redefinition error.[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. XrefParser.java - Enhanced Cycle Detection for PREV Chain[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Location: pdfbox/src/main/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdfparser/XrefParser.java**[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39ma[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Replace line [0m[1;36m102[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`long lastPrev = [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m;`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m with:[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```java[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mSet<Long> prevSet = new HashSet<>[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mb[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Update while loop condition at line [0m[1;36m105[0m[39m:[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```java[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhile [0m[1;39m([0m[39mprev > [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Add cycle detection immediately after line [0m[1;36m106[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mat the start of the while loop [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbody[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```java[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mprevSet.contains[0m[1;39m([0m[39mprev[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m{[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    throw new [0m[1;35mIOException[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"/Prev loop detected at offset "[0m[39m + prev[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mprevSet.add[0m[1;39m([0m[39mprev[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Remove lines [0m[1;36m107[0m[39m and [0m[1;36m173[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m176[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthe old lastPrev assignment and check[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Rationale:** HashSet-based detection tracks all visited offsets in the PREV [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchain, detecting any cycle [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnot just immediate self-loops[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. This prevents infinite [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mloops when malicious PDFs have circular PREV references. The Set import is already [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpresent at line [0m[1;36m22[0m[39m.[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. PDPageTree.java - Add Cycle Detection to PageIterator[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Location: pdfbox/src/main/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdmodel/PDPageTree.java**[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39ma[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Add visited field to PageIterator class [0m[1;39m([0m[39mafter line [0m[1;36m182[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```java[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprivate final Set<COSDictionary> visited = new HashSet<>[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mb[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Modify enqueueKids method [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m206[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to check visited status at the beginning:[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```java[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprivate List<COSDictionary> [0m[1;35menqueueKids[0m[1;39m([0m[39mCOSDictionary node[0m[1;39m)[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m{[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnode == null[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[1;35mLOG.error[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"Page skipped due to null node"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        return Collections.EMPTY_LIST;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mvisited.contains[0m[1;39m([0m[39mnode[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[1;35mLOG.warn[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"Circular reference detected in page tree, skipping node"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        return Collections.EMPTY_LIST;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;35mvisited.add[0m[1;39m([0m[39mnode[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35misPageTreeNode[0m[1;39m([0m[39mnode[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        return [0m[1;35mgetKids[0m[1;39m([0m[39mnode[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    else[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mCOSName.PAGE.equals[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mnode.getCOSName[0m[1;39m([0m[39mCOSName.TYPE[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m            [0m[1;35mqueue.add[0m[1;39m([0m[39mnode[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        else[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m            [0m[1;35mLOG.error[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"Page skipped due to an invalid or missing type [0m[32m{[0m[32m}[0m[32m"[0m[39m, [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m                    [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m -> [0m[1;35mnode.getCOSName[0m[1;39m([0m[39mCOSName.TYPE[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    return Collections.EMPTY_LIST;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Rationale:** The PageIterator's BFS traversal can loop infinitely with circular [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpage tree references. By tracking visited nodes and skipping them, we prevent [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minfinite loops while continuing to process other valid pages. This matches the [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpattern used in Splitter.java [0m[1;39m([0m[39mprocessResources method[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Justification[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Why This is Optimal[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Minimal changes:** Only modifies the specific problematic areas without [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maffecting broader codebase[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Consistent patterns:** Uses established patterns from the codebase [0m[1;39m([0m[39mvisited [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mSets, null checking[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Preserves functionality:** All existing behavior is maintained for valid [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minputs[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Clear error messages:** Provides descriptive IOExceptions for debugging[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Thread-safe approach:** Each method maintains its own cycle detection state[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### How It Preserves Existing Logic[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Type1CharStringParser:** Public API unchanged, depth tracking is internal [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mimplementation detail[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Type1Parser:** Only adds early exits for malformed fonts, valid fonts [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munaffected[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **XrefParser:** Same loop structure, just enhanced cycle detection[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **PDPageTree:** Iterator still builds complete queue, just skips cycles[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### How It Addresses All Issues[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Original timeout:** All infinite loop scenarios now have bounds [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdepth limits, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcycle detection, null checks[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Compilation error [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m:** processCallSubr signature now matches call site with [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdepth parameter[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Compilation error [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m:** By not modifying line [0m[1;36m133[0m[39m area incorrectly [0m[1;39m([0m[39mit's correct[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min original[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Compilation error [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m:** Reusing existing peekToken variable instead of [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mredeclaring[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Potential Side Effects[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **MAX_RECURSION_DEPTH might reject deeply nested valid fonts:** Mitigated by [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchoosing value of [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, which is generous for legitimate use cases[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Cycle detection in PageIterator might skip some pages:** This is the correct [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbehavior - circular references should be skipped[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **IOException thrown for truncated fonts:** This is correct - malformed fonts [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mshould fail gracefully with clear errors[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
