[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue reports a [0m[32m"libFuzzer: timeout"[0m[39m error, indicating that the fuzzer [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mencountered code that took too long to execute, likely due to infinite loops or [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexcessive recursion. The patch attempt addresses timeout issues across multiple [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfiles by adding cycle detection, bounds checking, and recursion depth limits in PDF[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mparsing and font processing code. However, the patch fails to compile due to two [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39merrors in `Type1CharStringParser.java`: a method signature mismatch where [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`processCallSubr` is called with an extra `depth` parameter that doesn't exist in [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe method definition, and a type incompatibility issue attempting to convert a [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`List<Object>` to `String`.[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Initial Issue[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe issue manifests as a timeout during libFuzzer execution. Timeout errors in [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzzing typically indicate:[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Infinite loops where termination conditions are never met[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Deeply nested or infinite recursion[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Algorithms with poor time complexity on adversarial inputs[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Missing validation checks that allow malformed input to trigger expensive [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moperations[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis is a critical issue as it prevents the fuzzer from exploring other code paths [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand indicates potential denial-of-service vulnerabilities.[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Patch Attempt Analysis[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch modifies four files to address potential timeout causes:[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m#### [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. `fontbox/src/main/java/org/apache/fontbox/type1/Type1Parser.java`[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Changes to encoding parsing [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m214[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:**[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Replaces a while loop condition checking for [0m[32m"dup"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"readonly"[0m[39m, or [0m[32m"def"[0m[39m tokens[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Adds null check for the peeked token before processing[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Throws `IOException` with message [0m[32m"Unexpected end of file while reading encoding"[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mif null token encountered[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Restructures the loop to use explicit `break` statement[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Changes to CharStrings parsing [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m637[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:**[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Similar restructuring for finding the `[0m[35m/[0m[95mCharStrings[0m[39m` token[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Adds null check for peeked token[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Throws `IOException` with message [0m[32m"/CharStrings token not found"[0m[39m if null token [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mencountered[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Uses explicit `break` statement instead of complex loop condition[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m#### [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. `pdfbox/src/main/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdfparser/XrefParser.java`[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Changes to PREV chain parsing [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m99[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:**[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Replaces simple `lastPrev` variable with a `HashSet<Long>` called `prevSet`[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Adds import for `java.util.Set`[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Detects cycles by checking if `prev` offset already exists in the set[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Throws `IOException` with message [0m[32m"/Prev loop detected at offset [0m[32m{[0m[32mprev[0m[32m}[0m[32m"[0m[39m when [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcycle detected[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Removes the later check that compared `prev == lastPrev` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m172[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m176[0m[1;39m)[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m#### [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. `pdfbox/src/main/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdmodel/PDPageTree.java`[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Changes to PageIterator [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m180[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:**[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Adds a `visited` HashSet to track visited nodes[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In `enqueueKids` method [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m206[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Adds null check for node parameter[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Checks if node already visited to detect circular references[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Logs warning [0m[32m"Circular reference detected in page tree, skipping node"[0m[39m when [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcycle found[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Returns empty list in both null and circular reference cases[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Simplifies null check logic in the else branch[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m#### [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. `fontbox/src/main/java/org/apache/fontbox/cff/Type1CharStringParser.java`[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Changes to recursion handling [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m46[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:**[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Adds constant `MAX_RECURSION_DEPTH = [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m`[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Modifies `parse` method signature to include `depth` parameter [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m78[0m[1;39m)[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Adds recursion depth check that throws `IOException` when `depth > [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mMAX_RECURSION_DEPTH`[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Updates initial call to `parse` to pass depth of [0m[1;36m0[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Attempts to call `processCallSubr` with additional `depth` parameter [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m95[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m**[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Compilation Errors[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Error [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mLine [0m[1;36m95[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:**[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmethod processCallSubr in class org.apache.fontbox.cff.Type1CharStringParser cannot[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbe applied to given types;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  required: java.util.List<byte[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[39m>,java.util.List<java.lang.Object>[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  found:    java.util.List<byte[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[39m>,java.util.List<java.lang.Object>,int[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch adds a `depth` parameter to the `parse` method call but attempts to pass [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthis parameter to `processCallSubr` without updating the method signature of [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`processCallSubr` itself. The method definition was not included in the patch, so [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mit still expects only two parameters.[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Error [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mLine [0m[1;36m133[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:**[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mincompatible types: java.util.List<java.lang.Object> cannot be converted to [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mjava.lang.String[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAt line [0m[1;36m133[0m[39m, there is a type mismatch where code attempts to assign or pass a [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`List<Object>` where a `String` is expected. This error is not directly visible in [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe provided patch diff, suggesting it may be a side effect of other changes or [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexists in code not shown in the diff.[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Areas for Further Investigation[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mTo achieve a comprehensive understanding and successful fix:[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **`Type1CharStringParser.processCallSubr` method**: The complete implementation [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mneeds review to determine how to properly propagate the depth parameter through [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrecursive calls[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Line [0m[1;36m133[0m[39m context in `Type1CharStringParser.java`**: The code around this line [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmust be examined to understand what operation is causing the type mismatch[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Recursive call chains in `Type1CharStringParser`**: All methods that [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mparticipate in parsing charstrings should be traced to ensure depth tracking is [0m    [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. **Integration between changes**: Whether the fixes need to be applied together [0m  [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m289[0m[39m:     * Returns the given COS page using a depth-first search.[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m290[0m[39m:     *[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m291[0m[39m:     * @param pageNum [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-based page number[0m                                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthan the page count[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m297[0m[39m:     *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpageNum[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m309[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m310[0m[39m:        else[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m311[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m312[0m[39m:            [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m collect already processed pages to detect possible recursions[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m313[0m[39m:            [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m to avoid a StackOverflowError[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m314[0m[39m:            [0m[1;35mpageSet.add[0m[1;39m([0m[39mnode[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m315[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m316[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35misPageTreeNode[0m[1;39m([0m[39mnode[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m317[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m318[0m[39m:            int count = [0m[1;35mnode.getInt[0m[1;39m([0m[39mCOSName.COUNT, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m319[0m[39m:            if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpageNum <= encountered + count[0m[1;39m)[0m                                 [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m52[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m53[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[39m**[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m54[0m[39m:     * Constructs a new Type1CharStringParser object.[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m55[0m[39m:     *[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m56[0m[39m:     * @param fontName font name[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m57[0m[39m:     *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m58[0m[39m:    public [0m[1;35mType1CharStringParser[0m[1;39m([0m[39mString fontName[0m[1;39m)[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m59[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m60[0m[39m:        this.fontName = fontName;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m61[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Analysis[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter examining the evaluation report and code snippets, I've identified the root [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcauses of both the initial timeout issue and the compilation errors:[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Initial Timeout Issue[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe timeout is caused by **unbounded recursion in Type1CharStringParser** when [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprocessing malformed fonts with cyclic subroutine references. The recursion chain [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mis:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `[0m[1;35mparse[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` → `[0m[1;35mprocessCallSubr[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` → `[0m[1;35mparse[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mrecursive call[0m[1;39m)[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `[0m[1;35mparse[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` → `[0m[1;35mprocessCallOtherSubr[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` → `[0m[1;35mparse[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mrecursive call[0m[1;39m)[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Compilation Errors[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Line [0m[1;36m95[0m[39m error**: The patch added a `depth` parameter to `[0m[1;35mparse[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` but [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mattempted to call `[0m[1;35mprocessCallSubr[0m[1;39m([0m[39msubrs, sequence, depth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` without updating [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`processCallSubr`'s signature.[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Line [0m[1;36m133[0m[39m error**: This appears to be a side effect from incorrect patch [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmodifications not visible in the diff.[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Additional Issues in Patch[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe previous patch addressed multiple files but had issues:[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Type1Parser.java: Changes are defensive but not the root cause[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- XrefParser.java: Correct approach using HashSet for cycle detection[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- PDPageTree.java: Correct approach using visited set[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Type1CharStringParser.java: Incomplete implementation [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmissing signature updates[0m[1;39m)[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. Type1CharStringParser.java - Complete Recursion Depth Tracking[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Add recursion depth constant** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mafter line [0m[1;36m48[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```java[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprivate static final int MAX_RECURSION_DEPTH = [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Update private parse method signature** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m78[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Change from: `private List<Object> [0m[1;35mparse[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbyte[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[39m bytes, List<byte[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[39m> subrs, [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mList<Object> sequence[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Change to: `private List<Object> [0m[1;35mparse[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbyte[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[39m bytes, List<byte[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[39m> subrs, [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mList<Object> sequence, int depth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Add depth check at the beginning of the method [0m[1;39m([0m[39mafter line [0m[1;36m80[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```java[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdepth > MAX_RECURSION_DEPTH[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      throw new [0m[1;35mIOException[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"Maximum recursion depth exceeded in charstring parsing[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [32mfor glyph '"[0m[39m [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          + currentGlyph + [0m[32m"' of font "[0m[39m + fontName[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Update processCallSubr method signature** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m109[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Change from: `private void [0m[1;35mprocessCallSubr[0m[1;39m([0m[39mList<byte[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[39m> subrs, List<Object> [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msequence[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Change to: `private void [0m[1;35mprocessCallSubr[0m[1;39m([0m[39mList<byte[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[39m> subrs, List<Object> [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msequence, int depth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Update the recursive parse call [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m125[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: `[0m[1;35mparse[0m[1;39m([0m[39msubrBytes, subrs, sequence, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdepth + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Update processCallOtherSubr method signature** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m145[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Change from: `private void [0m[1;35mprocessCallOtherSubr[0m[1;39m([0m[39mDataInput input, List<Object> [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msequence[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Change to: `private void [0m[1;35mprocessCallOtherSubr[0m[1;39m([0m[39mDataInput input, List<Object> [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msequence, int depth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The method doesn't currently call parse recursively, but based on the analysis it[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mshould when processing otherSubrs. However, since the original code doesn't have [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthis call, we only need to accept the depth parameter for consistency.[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Update method calls in private parse method**:[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Line [0m[1;36m87[0m[39m: Change `[0m[1;35mprocessCallSubr[0m[1;39m([0m[39msubrs, sequence[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to `[0m[1;35mprocessCallSubr[0m[1;39m([0m[39msubrs, [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msequence, depth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Line [0m[1;36m91[0m[39m: Change `[0m[1;35mprocessCallOtherSubr[0m[1;39m([0m[39minput, sequence[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to [0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mprocessCallOtherSubr[0m[1;39m([0m[39minput, sequence, depth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Update public entry point** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m75[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Change from: `return [0m[1;35mparse[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbytes, subrs, new ArrayList<>[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Change to: `return [0m[1;35mparse[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbytes, subrs, new ArrayList<>[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. XrefParser.java - Fix Cycle Detection [0m[1;39m([0m[39mReapply with correction[0m[1;39m)[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Add import** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mafter line [0m[1;36m24[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```java[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mimport java.util.Set;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Replace lastPrev with HashSet** [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m102[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Remove: `long lastPrev = [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m;`[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Add: `Set<Long> prevSet = new HashSet<>[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Update while loop condition** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m105[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Change from: `while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mprev > [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m && prev != lastPrev[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Change to: `while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mprev > [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Add cycle detection inside loop** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mafter line [0m[1;36m105[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```java[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mprevSet.contains[0m[1;39m([0m[39mprev[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    throw new [0m[1;35mIOException[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"/Prev loop detected at offset "[0m[39m + prev[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mprevSet.add[0m[1;39m([0m[39mprev[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Remove old lastPrev assignment** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m107[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Remove: `lastPrev = prev;`[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Remove duplicate check** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m173[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m176[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Remove the entire if block that checks `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mprev == lastPrev[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. PDPageTree.java - Add Visited Set to PageIterator [0m[1;39m([0m[39mReapply[0m[1;39m)[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Add visited set field to PageIterator** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mafter line [0m[1;36m182[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```java[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprivate final Set<COSDictionary> visited = new HashSet<>[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Update enqueueKids method** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstarting at line [0m[1;36m206[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Add null check at the beginning:[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```java[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnode == null[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;35mLOG.error[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"Page skipped due to null node"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      return Collections.EMPTY_LIST;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Add cycle detection after null check:[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```java[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mvisited.contains[0m[1;39m([0m[39mnode[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;35mLOG.warn[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"Circular reference detected in page tree, skipping node"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      return Collections.EMPTY_LIST;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;35mvisited.add[0m[1;39m([0m[39mnode[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Simplify the else branch at line [0m[1;36m214[0m[39m: remove the `node != null &&` check since we[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39malready checked for null[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. Type1Parser.java - Add Defensive Null Checks [0m[1;39m([0m[39mReapply[0m[1;39m)[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Update readEncoding method** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m217[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m223[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Replace the while loop with:[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```java[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtrue[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      Token token = [0m[1;35mlexer.peekToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtoken == null[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          throw new [0m[1;35mIOException[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"Unexpected end of file while reading encoding"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mlexer.peekKind[0m[1;39m([0m[39mToken.NAME[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          && [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mtoken.getText[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35m.equals[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"dup"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m              || [0m[1;35mtoken.getText[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35m.equals[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"readonly"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m              || [0m[1;35mtoken.getText[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35m.equals[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"def"[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          break;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;35mlexer.nextToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Update parseBinary method** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m640[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m644[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Replace the while loop with:[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```java[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtrue[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      Token peekToken = [0m[1;35mlexer.peekToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpeekToken == null[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          throw new [0m[1;35mIOException[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"/CharStrings token not found"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mlexer.peekKind[0m[1;39m([0m[39mToken.LITERAL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          && [0m[1;35mpeekToken.getText[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35m.equals[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"CharStrings"[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          break;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;35mlexer.nextToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Justification[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Why This Approach is Optimal[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Addresses Root Cause**: The recursion depth tracking in Type1CharStringParser [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdirectly addresses the timeout issue caused by cyclic subroutine references.[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Complete Implementation**: Unlike the previous patch, this updates ALL method [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msignatures in the recursion chain, ensuring the depth parameter is properly [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpropagated.[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Follows Existing Patterns**: The visited-set pattern for cycle detection in [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mXrefParser and PDPageTree follows the same approach already used in other parts of [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe codebase [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., Splitter.processResources[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Preserves Existing Logic**: All changes are additive - we're adding checks [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwithout modifying the core parsing logic.[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Reasonable Limits**: MAX_RECURSION_DEPTH of [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m is reasonable for legitimate [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfonts while preventing malicious input from causing timeouts.[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### How It Preserves Existing Functionality[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- All method signatures maintain their original parameters, only adding the depth [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mparameter[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The public API [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;35mparse[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbyte[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[39m bytes, List<byte[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[39m> subrs, String glyphName[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mremains unchanged[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- All existing logic paths remain intact; we only add early termination conditions[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Error messages are descriptive and include context [0m[1;39m([0m[39mglyph name, font name[0m[1;39m)[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Potential Side Effects and Mitigations[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Legitimate deep recursion**: Some valid fonts might have deeply nested [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubroutines[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Mitigation: The limit of [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m is conservative but should handle legitimate cases[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbased on typical font structures[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Different error manifestation**: Instead of timeout, malformed fonts will [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthrow IOException[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Mitigation: This is better - it provides clear error messages and prevents [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mresource exhaustion[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Performance overhead**: Depth tracking adds integer parameter passing[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Mitigation: Negligible overhead compared to the actual parsing operations[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Similar Solutions in Codebase[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe visited-set pattern is already used in:[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- [0m[1;35mPDPageTree.get[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m method [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m304[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m314[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - uses instance field pageSet[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- [0m[1;35mSplitter.processResources[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m595[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m600[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - uses parameter-passed visited set[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe recursion depth limiting pattern is a standard approach for preventing stack [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflow in recursive parsers, similar to depth limits in JSON/XML parsers.[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         +                [1m}[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                          [1;35mlexer.nextToken[0m[1m([0m[1m)[0m;                                                 [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         @@ [1;36m-637[0m,[1;36m9[0m +[1;36m646[0m,[1;36m18[0m @@                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                  [35m/[0m[35m/[0m some fonts have [32m"2 index"[0m here, others have [32m"end noaccess put"[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                  [35m/[0m[35m/[0m sometimes followed by [32m"put"[0m. Either way, we just skip until             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                  [35m/[0m[35m/[0m the [35m/[0m[95mCharStrings[0m dict is found                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -        while [1m([0m![1m([0m[1;35mlexer.peekKind[0m[1m([0mToken.LITERAL[1m)[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -                && [1;35mlexer.peekToken[0m[1m([0m[1m)[0m[1;35m.getText[0m[1m([0m[1m)[0m[1;35m.equals[0m[1m([0m[32m"CharStrings"[0m[1m)[0m[1m)[0m[1m)[0m             [2m                [0m
