[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===[0m[33mIssue[0m[39m===[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mERROR: libFuzzer: timeout[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue reports a libFuzzer timeout error, indicating that the fuzzer [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mencountered code that took too long to execute, likely due to infinite loops or [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munbounded recursion. The patch attempt addresses multiple potential timeout sources[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39macross four files: Type1Parser.java, XrefParser.java, PDPageTree.java, and [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mType1CharStringParser.java. However, the patch fails to compile due to four [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdistinct errors: method signature mismatches in Type1CharStringParser.java [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtwo [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39merrors[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, a type incompatibility error in Type1CharStringParser.java, and a variable[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mredeclaration error in Type1Parser.java.[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Initial Issue[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe issue presents a libFuzzer timeout error without additional context. LibFuzzer [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtimeouts typically occur when the fuzzer inputs trigger code paths that:[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Contain infinite or very long-running loops[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Have unbounded recursion[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Lack proper termination conditions[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Process circular references without detection[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Patch Attempt Analysis[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch attempts to address potential timeout sources in multiple locations:[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m#### [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. Type1Parser.java - Two modifications:[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**First modification [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m214[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:**[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Transforms a while loop condition that checks for specific token names [0m[1;39m([0m[32m"dup"[0m[39m, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [32m"readonly"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"def"[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Adds null check for the token before processing[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Throws IOException with message [0m[32m"Unexpected end of file while reading encoding"[0m[39m [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mif token is null[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Restructures the loop from a complex while condition to `[0m[1;35mwhile[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtrue[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` with [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexplicit break[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Reduces redundant `[0m[1;35mlexer.peekToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` calls by storing result in a variable[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Second modification [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m646[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:**[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Similar restructuring of a while loop searching for [0m[32m"CharStrings"[0m[39m literal token[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Introduces variable `peekToken` to store `[0m[1;35mlexer.peekToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` result[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Adds null check and throws IOException with message [0m[32m"/CharStrings token not [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [32mfound"[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Changes from conditional while loop to `[0m[1;35mwhile[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtrue[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` with explicit break[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Compilation Error:** Variable `peekToken` is already defined in the method [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mparseBinary[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbyte[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, causing redeclaration error.[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m#### [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. XrefParser.java [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m99[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Replaces simple loop variable `lastPrev` with a HashSet `prevSet` to detect [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcycles[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Changes loop condition from `while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mprev > [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m && prev != lastPrev[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to `while [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mprev > [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Adds cycle detection: checks if `prev` exists in `prevSet` before processing[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Throws IOException with message [0m[32m"/Prev loop detected at offset [0m[32m[[0m[32mvalue[0m[32m][0m[32m"[0m[39m when [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcycle detected[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Removes post-loop check for `prev == lastPrev`[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Import statement for `java.util.Set` is added[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m#### [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. PDPageTree.java [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m180[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Adds `visited` HashSet field to PageIterator class to track visited nodes[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In `enqueueKids` method, adds three safeguards:[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. Null node check at method start[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. Circular reference detection using `visited` set[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. Logs warnings/errors appropriately[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Returns `Collections.EMPTY_LIST` for null or circular reference cases[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Removes redundant null check for node later in the method[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m#### [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. Type1CharStringParser.java [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m46[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Introduces `MAX_RECURSION_DEPTH` constant set to [0m[1;36m10[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Modifies `parse` method signature to include `int depth` parameter[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Public `parse` method initializes depth to [0m[1;36m0[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Private `parse` method checks if depth exceeds MAX_RECURSION_DEPTH[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Throws IOException with descriptive message including glyph name and font name[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Updates calls to `processCallSubr` and `processCallOtherSubr` to pass depth [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mparameter[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Compilation Errors:**[0m                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m566[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m567[0m[39m:            throw new [0m[1;35mIOException[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"/Private token not found"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m568[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m569[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m570[0m[39m:        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Private dict[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m571[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mread[0m[1;39m([0m[39mToken.LITERAL, [0m[32m"Private"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m572[0m[39m:        int length = [0m[1;35mread[0m[1;39m([0m[39mToken.INTEGER[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35m.intValue[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m573[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mread[0m[1;39m([0m[39mToken.NAME, [0m[32m"dict"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                               [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m575[0m[39m:        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m instead of the [0m[32m"dup"[0m                                                 [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m578[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m579[0m[39m:        int lenIV = [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m; [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m number of random bytes at start of charstring[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m580[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m581[0m[39m:        for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint i = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; i < length; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m                                        [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m53[0m[39m:     * The given byte array will be parsed and converted to a Type2 sequence.[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m54[0m[39m:     * [0m                                                                          [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter analyzing the code snippets and evaluation report, I've identified the root [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcauses of all compilation errors and the original timeout issue:[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Root Causes[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Timeout Issue**: Unbounded recursion in `[0m[1;35mType1CharStringParser.parse[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` when [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubroutines call other subroutines [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m125[0m[39m in `processCallSubr`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, and potentially[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minfinite loops in `[0m[1;35mType1Parser.parseBinary[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` when searching for tokens without [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnull checks.[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Compilation Errors**:[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Error [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m & [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m**: `processCallSubr` and `processCallOtherSubr` method [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msignatures don't accept a `depth` parameter, but the failed patch tried to pass [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mone.[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Error [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m**: The failed patch likely introduced incorrect logging that tried [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto use `sequence` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mList<Object>[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m as a String.[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Error [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m**: Variable `peekToken` is already declared at line [0m[1;36m556[0m[39m in [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mparseBinary[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, but the failed patch tried to redeclare it around line [0m[1;36m651[0m[39m.[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Comprehensive Fix Strategy[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. Fix Type1CharStringParser Recursion Depth Limiting[0m                           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```java[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis method doesn't recursively call `[0m[1;35mparse[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, so it doesn't need depth tracking.[0m  [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39ma[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Around line [0m[1;36m640[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m644[0m[39m, replace the CharStrings search loop with a null-safe [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpattern that reuses the existing `peekToken` variable [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdeclared at line [0m[1;36m556[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```java[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Reuse peekToken, don't redeclare it[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpeekToken = [0m[1;35mlexer.peekToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhile [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpeekToken != null && ![0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mlexer.peekKind[0m[1;39m([0m[39mToken.LITERAL[0m[1;39m)[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        && [0m[1;35mpeekToken.getText[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35m.equals[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"CharStrings"[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m{[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;35mlexer.nextToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    peekToken = [0m[1;35mlexer.peekToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpeekToken == null[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m{[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    throw new [0m[1;35mIOException[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"/CharStrings token not found"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mb[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Similarly, fix the encoding search loop around lines [0m[1;36m217[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m223[0m[39m to add null checks:[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```java[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mToken token = [0m[1;35mlexer.peekToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtoken == null[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m{[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    throw new [0m[1;35mIOException[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"Unexpected end of file while reading encoding"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhile [0m[1;39m([0m[39m![0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mlexer.peekKind[0m[1;39m([0m[39mToken.NAME[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        && [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mtoken.getText[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35m.equals[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"dup"[0m[1;39m)[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m                || [0m[1;35mtoken.getText[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35m.equals[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"readonly"[0m[1;39m)[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m                || [0m[1;35mtoken.getText[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35m.equals[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"def"[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m{[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;35mlexer.nextToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    token = [0m[1;35mlexer.peekToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtoken == null[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        throw new [0m[1;35mIOException[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"Unexpected end of file while reading encoding"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mNote: For this loop, we use a new variable `token` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnot `peekToken`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m because [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`peekToken` is used elsewhere in the method and we don't want to interfere with its[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mscope.[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. Maintain XrefParser and PDPageTree Patches[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe previous patches for `XrefParser.java` and `PDPageTree.java` should be [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreapplied as they address legitimate timeout concerns:[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **XrefParser**: Replace `lastPrev` with `HashSet<Long> prevSet` for cycle [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdetection[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **PDPageTree**: Add `visited` HashSet to PageIterator for circular reference [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdetection[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThese patches are correct and should be preserved.[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Justification[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Why This Approach is Optimal[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Follows Existing Patterns**: The recursion depth limiting follows the exact [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpattern used in `[0m[1;35mGlyphTable.getGlyphData[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m173[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m188[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, which is already in [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe codebase and proven to work.[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Fixes All Compilation Errors**:[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Adds depth parameter to `processCallSubr` signature, fixing errors [0m[1;36m1[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Does NOT add depth parameter to `processCallOtherSubr`, avoiding unnecessary [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchanges[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Reuses existing `peekToken` variable, fixing error [0m[1;36m4[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Avoids incorrect type usage that caused error [0m[1;36m3[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Preserves Existing Logic**: [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The parse method's core logic remains unchanged[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Only adds safety checks before recursing[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Maintains the same return values and side effects[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Addresses All Timeout Sources**:[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Prevents unbounded recursion in Type1CharStringParser[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Prevents infinite loops in Type1Parser token searches[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Maintains cycle detection in XrefParser and PDPageTree[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### How It Addresses Evaluation Report Issues[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Original timeout**: Fixed by limiting recursion depth in subroutine calls[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Compilation error [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m & [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m**: Fixed by properly threading depth parameter through [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe call chain[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Compilation error [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m**: Avoided by not modifying existing log statements or [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39merror messages[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Compilation error [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m**: Fixed by reusing existing variable instead of [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mredeclaring[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Potential Side Effects and Mitigation[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Legitimate deep recursion rejected**: A legitimate font with deep subroutine [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnesting [0m[1;39m([0m[39m>[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m levels[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m would be rejected. [0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Mitigation**: The limit of [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m is reasonable for Type1 fonts. Real-world [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfonts rarely exceed [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m levels. If needed, the constant can be increased to [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m.[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Performance impact**: Adding depth parameter requires passing an extra integer[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthrough the call chain.[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Mitigation**: Minimal impact - passing an int is extremely cheap, and the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdepth check is a single comparison.[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Error messages change slightly**: IOException messages now include [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdepth/nesting information.[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Mitigation**: This is actually beneficial for debugging malformed fonts.[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Similar Solutions in Codebase[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `[0m[1;35mGlyphTable.getGlyphData[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`: Uses the exact same pattern for limiting composite [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mglyph recursion depth[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `[0m[1;35mreadSubrs[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` in Type1Parser: Shows proper null checking patterns for lexer [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moperations[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Various tree traversal methods: Show cycle detection patterns using HashSet[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis fix strategy ensures all compilation errors are resolved while properly [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maddressing the timeout vulnerability through recursion depth limiting and null-safe[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtoken parsing.[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[01/12/26 01:02:34][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=477700;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=221297;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\

[2;36m                    [0m         @@ [1;36m-214[0m,[1;36m11[0m +[1;36m214[0m,[1;36m20[0m @@                                                               [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         -            [1m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         +            while [1m([0mtrue[1m)[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         +            [1m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         +                Token token = [1;35mlexer.peekToken[0m[1m([0m[1m)[0m;                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         +                if [1m([0mtoken == null[1m)[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         +                [1m{[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         +                    throw new [1;35mIOException[0m[1m([0m[32m"Unexpected end of file while reading [0m   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        return [0m[1;35mparse[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbytes, subrs, new ArrayList<>[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    private List<Object> [0m[1;35mparse[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbyte[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[39m bytes, List<byte[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[39m> subrs, List<Object> [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msequence, int depth[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m             throws IOException[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdepth > MAX_RECURSION_DEPTH[0m[1;39m)[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            throw new [0m[1;35mIOException[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"Maximum recursion depth exceeded in charstring [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [32mparsing for glyph '"[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+                    + currentGlyph + [0m[32m"' of font "[0m[39m + fontName[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         DataInput input = new [0m[1;35mDataInputByteArray[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         while [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35minput.hasRemaining[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m             int b0 = [0m[1;35minput.readUnsignedByte[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m             if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mb0 == CALLSUBR[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m             [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+                [0m[1;35mprocessCallSubr[0m[1;39m([0m[39msubrs, sequence, depth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m             [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m             else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mb0 == TWO_BYTE && [0m[1;35minput.peekUnsignedByte[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m == CALLOTHERSUBR[0m[1;39m)[0m [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m[[0m[39mERROR[0m[1;39m][0m[39m Re-run Maven using the -X switch to enable full debug logging.[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m[[0m[39mERROR[0m[1;39m][0m[39m [0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m[[0m[39mERROR[0m[1;39m][0m[39m For more information about the errors[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===[0m[33mIssue[0m[39m===[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mERROR: libFuzzer: timeout[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue reports a [0m[32m"libFuzzer: timeout"[0m[39m error, indicating that fuzzing [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moperations are triggering infinite loops or unbounded execution in the codebase. [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch attempt addresses multiple potential timeout sources across three main [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mareas: Type1 font parsing, PDF cross-reference parsing, and page tree traversal. [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHowever, the patch fails to compile due to two errors in the [0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`Type1CharStringParser.java` file: [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m a method signature mismatch where [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`processCallSubr` is called with three arguments but only accepts two, and [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m an [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mincompatible type conversion from `List<Object>` to `String`.[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Initial Issue Analysis[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe issue [0m[32m"ERROR: libFuzzer: timeout"[0m[39m indicates that during fuzz testing, the code [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39menters execution paths that take excessive time to complete or never terminate. [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis typically occurs due to:[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Infinite loops caused by missing termination conditions[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Circular references in data structures that are traversed without cycle detection[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Unbounded recursion without depth limits[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Missing null checks or end-of-stream validation[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe timeout suggests the fuzzer discovered inputs that exploit these weaknesses, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcausing the parser or processor to hang indefinitely.[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Patch Attempt Description[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch modifies four files to address potential timeout sources:[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m#### [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. `fontbox/src/main/java/org/apache/fontbox/type1/Type1Parser.java`[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mTwo while loops are refactored to prevent infinite execution:[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **First modification [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m217[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m**: Changes a while loop that searches for [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mspecific encoding tokens [0m[1;39m([0m[32m"dup"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"readonly"[0m[39m, or [0m[32m"def"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. The original loop had no [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnull check on `[0m[1;35mpeekToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`. The patch:[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Converts the while condition to `while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtrue[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` with explicit break[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Adds null check: if `[0m[1;35mlexer.peekToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` returns null, throws [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mIOException[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"Unexpected end of file while reading encoding"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Stores token in a variable to avoid multiple `[0m[1;35mpeekToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` calls[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Breaks when the desired tokens are found[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Second modification [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m649[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m**: Similar refactoring for a loop [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msearching for the [0m[32m"CharStrings"[0m[39m token:[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Converts to `while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtrue[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` with explicit break[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Adds null check: if `[0m[1;35mpeekToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` returns null, throws [0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mIOException[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"/CharStrings token not found"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Breaks when [0m[32m"CharStrings"[0m[39m literal is found[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m#### [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. `pdfbox/src/main/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdfparser/XrefParser.java`[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mModifies the cross-reference table parsing to detect circular references:[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Replaces the simple `lastPrev` comparison [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwhich only detects consecutive [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mduplicates[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m with a `HashSet<Long>` called `prevSet`[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Adds import for `java.util.Set`[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Before processing each `[0m[35m/[0m[95mPrev[0m[39m` offset, checks if it's already in the set[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- If a duplicate is detected, throws `[0m[1;35mIOException[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"/Prev loop detected at offset "[0m[39m [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ prev[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Removes the post-processing check that came after the offset fix logic[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m#### [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. `pdfbox/src/main/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdmodel/PDPageTree.java`[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAdds cycle detection to the page tree iterator:[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Adds a `visited` HashSet field to the `PageIterator` inner class to track visited[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnodes[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In `[0m[1;35menqueueKids[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` method:[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Adds explicit null check at the start [0m[1;39m([0m[39malready existed implicitly but now [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexplicit[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Before processing a node, checks if it's in the `visited` set[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - If already visited, logs a warning about circular reference and returns empty [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlist[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Adds the node to `visited` set before processing[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Simplifies null check logic in the else branch[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m#### [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. `fontbox/src/main/java/org/apache/fontbox/cff/Type1CharStringParser.java`[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAttempts to add recursion depth limiting:[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Adds constant `MAX_RECURSION_DEPTH = [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m`[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Modifies `[0m[1;35mparse[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` method signature to accept a `depth` parameter[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Public `[0m[1;35mparse[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` method now calls private version with initial depth of [0m[1;36m0[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Adds depth check that throws `IOException` if `MAX_RECURSION_DEPTH` is exceeded[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Calls `[0m[1;35mprocessCallSubr[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` with the depth parameter[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Compilation Errors[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch fails with two compilation errors:[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Error [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mLine [0m[1;36m95[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m**: [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmethod processCallSubr in class org.apache.fontbox.cff.Type1CharStringParser cannot[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbe applied to given types;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  required: java.util.List<byte[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[39m>,java.util.List<java.lang.Object>[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  found:    java.util.List<byte[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[39m>,java.util.List<java.lang.Object>,int[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch calls `[0m[1;35mprocessCallSubr[0m[1;39m([0m[39msubrs, sequence, depth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` with three arguments, but[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe method signature only accepts two parameters. The patch modifies the caller but[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdoesn't update the `[0m[1;35mprocessCallSubr[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` method signature to accept the depth [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mparameter.[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Error [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mLine [0m[1;36m133[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m**:[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mincompatible types: java.util.List<java.lang.Object> cannot be converted to [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mjava.lang.String[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis suggests there's a type mismatch at line [0m[1;36m133[0m[39m where a `List<Object>` is being [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mused where a `String` is expected. Without seeing the full context, this likely [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minvolves the recursive call to `[0m[1;35mparse[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` or related method invocations.[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Areas Requiring Further Investigation[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Type1CharStringParser.java**: The complete implementation of [0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mprocessCallSubr[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` method needs examination to understand:[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Its current signature and how it should be modified to accept a depth [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mparameter[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - How the depth should be propagated through subroutine calls[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The line [0m[1;36m133[0m[39m context to understand the type conversion issue[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Recursive parsing patterns**: Investigate all locations where `[0m[1;35mparse[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmethods call themselves or other parsing methods recursively to ensure consistent [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdepth tracking.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Other potential timeout sources**: The patch addresses specific parsing loops,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbut a comprehensive review should identify:[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Other while loops without proper termination conditions[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Other recursive structures without depth limits[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Other graph traversals without cycle detection[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Test coverage**: Understanding what specific inputs trigger the timeout would [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhelp validate whether these patches address the actual issue or if other timeout [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msources exist.[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **PDPageTree dependencies**: Review how the page tree iterator is used [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthroughout the codebase to ensure the cycle detection doesn't break legitimate use [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcases.[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. **XrefParser behavior**: Verify that the HashSet-based cycle detection properly [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhandles all valid PDF structures and doesn't introduce false positives.[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m117[0m[39m:                    obj, currentGlyph, fontName[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m118[0m[39m:            return;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m119[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m120[0m[39m:        int operand = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m obj;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m121[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m122[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39moperand >= [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m && operand < [0m[1;35msubrs.size[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m123[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcommand[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
