[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Analysis of Compilation Errors and Root Causes[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe evaluation report shows two compilation errors in `Type1CharStringParser.java`:[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Line [0m[1;36m95[0m[39m**: Method signature mismatch - `processCallSubr` called with [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39marguments but only accepts [0m[1;36m2[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Line [0m[1;36m133[0m[39m**: Type conversion error - `List<Object>` cannot be converted to [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`String`[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mBoth errors stem from incomplete modifications when adding recursion depth [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtracking. The patch correctly identified the need for depth limiting but failed to [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mupdate all necessary method signatures and calls consistently.[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Comprehensive Fix Strategy[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. Type1CharStringParser Recursion Depth Limiting[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Goal**: Add recursion depth tracking to prevent infinite loops in subroutine [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcalls while maintaining type compatibility.[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Implementation Steps**:[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Add constant for maximum recursion depth [0m[1;39m([0m[39malready in patch, keep it[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```java[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   private static final int MAX_RECURSION_DEPTH = [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Modify the **private** `parse` method signature to accept depth parameter:[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Current: `private List<Object> [0m[1;35mparse[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbyte[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[39m bytes, List<byte[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[39m> subrs, [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mList<Object> sequence[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - New: `private List<Object> [0m[1;35mparse[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbyte[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[39m bytes, List<byte[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[39m> subrs, [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mList<Object> sequence, int depth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Add depth check at the **beginning** of the private `parse` method [0m[1;39m([0m[39mafter line [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m79[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```java[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdepth > MAX_RECURSION_DEPTH[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                 [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. Type1Parser Infinite Loop Prevention[0m                                         [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Rationale**: Store `[0m[1;35mpeekToken[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` result in a variable to avoid multiple calls, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcheck for null before accessing properties, use explicit break for clear [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtermination.[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. XrefParser Cycle Detection Enhancement[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Goal**: Replace consecutive duplicate detection with comprehensive cycle [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdetection using HashSet.[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Implementation Steps**:[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Add import for `java.util.Set` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mif not already present - line [0m[1;36m24[0m[39m shows imports[0m[1;39m)[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Replace `long lastPrev = [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m;` declaration [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m102[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m with:[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```java[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   Set<Long> prevSet = new HashSet<>[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Modify loop condition [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m105[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Current: `while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mprev > [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m && prev != lastPrev[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - New: `while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mprev > [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Add cycle check **immediately after** the loop start [0m[1;39m([0m[39mafter line [0m[1;36m106[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```java[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mprevSet.contains[0m[1;39m([0m[39mprev[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       throw new [0m[1;35mIOException[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"/Prev loop detected at offset "[0m[39m + prev[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;35mprevSet.add[0m[1;39m([0m[39mprev[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Remove the assignment `lastPrev = prev;` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m107[0m[1;39m)[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Remove the redundant post-check [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m173[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m176[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```java[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mprev == lastPrev[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       throw new [0m[1;35mIOException[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"/Prev loop at offset "[0m[39m + prev[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Rationale**: HashSet tracks ALL visited offsets, detecting any cycle pattern [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mA→B→C→A[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, not just consecutive duplicates [0m[1;39m([0m[39mA→A[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. PDPageTree Cycle Detection[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Goal**: Add visited set to PageIterator to prevent infinite loops from circular [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpage tree references.[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Implementation Steps**:[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Add field to `PageIterator` class [0m[1;39m([0m[39mafter line [0m[1;36m182[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```java[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   private final Set<COSDictionary> visited = new HashSet<>[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Add cycle detection at the **beginning** of `enqueueKids` method [0m[1;39m([0m[39mafter line [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m206[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```java[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnode == null[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;35mLOG.error[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"Page skipped due to null node"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       return Collections.EMPTY_LIST;[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mvisited.contains[0m[1;39m([0m[39mnode[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;35mLOG.warn[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"Circular reference detected in page tree, skipping node"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       return Collections.EMPTY_LIST;[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;35mvisited.add[0m[1;39m([0m[39mnode[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Simplify the else branch null check [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m214[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Current: `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnode != null && [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mCOSName.PAGE.equals[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mnode.getCOSName[0m[1;39m([0m[39mCOSName.TYPE[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - New: `if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mCOSName.PAGE.equals[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mnode.getCOSName[0m[1;39m([0m[39mCOSName.TYPE[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   Since null is now checked earlier, the explicit null check in the else branch is[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mredundant.[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Update the error log [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m220[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to remove null check:[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Current: `[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m -> [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnode == null ? [0m[32m"[0m[32m([0m[32mnull[0m[32m)[0m[32m"[0m[39m : [0m[1;35mnode.getCOSName[0m[1;39m([0m[39mCOSName.TYPE[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - New: `[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m -> [0m[1;35mnode.getCOSName[0m[1;39m([0m[39mCOSName.TYPE[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Rationale**: Follows the established pattern in `Splitter.processResources` and [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe existing `PDPageTree.get` method. Early null and cycle checks prevent infinite [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mloops while maintaining clean logic flow.[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Justification[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Why This Approach is Optimal[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Addresses All Timeout Sources**: The strategy tackles four distinct timeout [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcauses:[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Unbounded recursion in font parsing[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Infinite loops in token scanning[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Circular reference chains in PDF structure[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Circular page tree traversal[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Follows Established Patterns**: Each fix mirrors existing patterns in the [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcodebase:[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `GlyphTable.getGlyphData` uses depth parameters[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `Splitter.processResources` uses visited sets[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `PDPageTree.get` already has cycle detection[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Minimal Invasiveness**: Changes are localized to specific methods without [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maffecting broader functionality[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Type Safety**: Correctly propagates depth parameters through method signatures[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwithout type mismatches[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### How It Preserves Existing Logic[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Type1CharStringParser**: The sequence is still modified in-place, return [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvalues are unchanged, all existing parsing logic remains intact[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Type1Parser**: Only adds safety checks before existing loop logic, doesn't [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchange the token matching behavior[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **XrefParser**: Still follows the [0m[35m/[0m[95mPrev[0m[39m chain exactly as before, only adds [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcomprehensive cycle detection[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **PDPageTree**: Still traverses the tree in the same order, only skips [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39malready-visited nodes[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Addressing Compilation Errors[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Error at line [0m[1;36m95[0m[39m**: Fixed by adding depth parameter to `processCallSubr` [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msignature and updating all call sites[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Error at line [0m[1;36m133[0m[39m**: This occurs if the patch incorrectly assigns the parse [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mresult. The fix ensures parse is called without assignment, maintaining void-like [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbehavior[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Potential Side Effects and Mitigations[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **[0m[3;91mFalse[0m[39m Positives in Cycle Detection**: [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Mitigation**: Uses object identity [0m[1;39m([0m[39mHashSet with dictionary objects[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, which [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mis correct for detecting actual circular references[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Valid PDF structures won't trigger false positives[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Legitimate Deep Recursion**:[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Mitigation**: MAX_RECURSION_DEPTH = [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m matches the pattern from font table [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mparsing and should accommodate legitimate font structures[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Can be adjusted if legitimate fonts fail[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Performance Impact**:[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Mitigation**: HashSet operations are [0m[1;35mO[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, minimal overhead[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Only active during parsing, not affecting normal operations[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Similar Solutions in Codebase[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **GlyphTable.getGlyphData** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m173[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m188[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: Uses level parameter and [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mmaxp.getMaxComponentDepth[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` check[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Splitter.processResources** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m595[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m599[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: Uses visited set with contains [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcheck and early return[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **PDPageTree.get** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m304[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m314[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: Uses pageSet for cycle detection in existing[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcode[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Conclusion[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis fix strategy comprehensively addresses the timeout issue by adding proper [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtermination conditions to all unbounded loops and recursive structures. The changes[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mare minimal, follow established patterns, maintain type safety, and preserve all [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexisting functionality while preventing malicious or malformed inputs from causing [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minfinite execution.[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
